page.title: 18INDUSTRY IN MICHAELCHURCH
page.content: Around the area of Michaelchurch there is very little industry. Farming tends to be the major employer of labour. Cattle sheep and other livestock are reared for their meat and other items such as milk and eggs are sold at market. Local mployers include builders retailers who sell items from the post office or from the garages. There are car breakers near to the study area. Forestry is another employer in the area. All of these are small local industries who employ only a small number of people.
